Home.title: WELCOME TO UR PRODUCTS
Home.subTitle: We are one of the formations of the iraqi ministry of industry and minerals. We work on manufacturing and assembling many electronic products in cooperation with reputable inter national companies.

About.title: About us
About.subTitle: About Ur Product
About.text1: UR it is the trademark of the products of the General Company for Electronic Systems, which is the formations of the Iraqi Ministry of Industry.
About.text2: In the next years, we are working with a strong will to build an industrial institution that covers the needs of the public and private sectors and encourages the national product.
About.text3: Creating a professional work environment that attracts competencies that spreads the spirit of belonging to the company in the hearts of employees.
About.text4: Raising Iraqi electronic industries by building customer trust in local products, relying on Iraqi competencies to meet the needs of both public and private sectors.

Services.title: Services
Services.MaintenanceText: We have a full staff with complete devices and equipment that work to rehabilitate idle devices.
Services.InstallationText: We have staff working on installing and programming the electronic devices of our products.
Services.SupplyingText: Our products work on supplying electronic materials and devices such as surveillance cameras of all kinds, alarm and firefighting systems, as well as solar energy devices and systems and tablets.
